ticket.title: render_to_string :template before normal render causes assert_template failures
ticket.original-body:
When render_to_string :template => ... is called in a controller action and a normal template render later occurs
Tests that uses assert_template will fail claiming that the template is ''
See also ticket #1383 for an earlier similar problem.
Jarl
ticket.latest-body:

version.body-html:
I am not able to reproduce it. Look at the attached test case.

Even if this ticket is rendered as invalid the attached patch could be merged because it is strengthening the existing test case. I checked and did not find any test covering the scenario mentioned in the patch.

@Jal can you create a small app on github so that I could reproduce the error. Thanks.
version.title: render_to_string :template before normal render causes assert_template failures

version.body: not open to open the attachment. not sure why. uploading again.
version.body-html: not open to open the attachment. not sure why. uploading again.
version.title: render_to_string :template before normal render causes assert_template failures

version.body:
Neeraj, done as you requested: https://github.com/jarl-dk/bug5891
This is a simple project created with rails bug5891 cd bug5891 ./script/generate scaffold notes
Now commit ffa0afcc94f5e9d357ee8d5c5ef94d9a0dd09d7a introduces a reasonable test that assert that the show action uses correct template. This test passes until commit a1ba70ae15a5e114419b2662ecb743f6b4d9a74d) that introduces a render_to_string in the controller that renders some other template (into a string).
@Neeraj, could you please from that create a failing test in rails 2.3-stable. I think the reason that you test (in your patch) does not fail is because both render_to_string :template => "test/hello_world" and render :template => "test/hello_world" renders the same template, try to change `render_to_string` to render some other template
version.body-html:
Neeraj, done as you requested:
https://github.com/jarl-dk/bug5891

This is a simple project created with

rails bug5891
cd bug5891
./script/generate scaffold notes

Now commit ffa0afcc94f5e9d357ee8d5c5ef94d9a0dd09d7a introduces a reasonable test that assert that the show action uses correct template. This test passes until commit a1ba70ae15a5e114419b2662ecb743f6b4d9a74d) that introduces a render_to_string in the controller that renders some other template (into a string).

@Neeraj, could you please from that create a failing test in rails 2.3-stable. I think the reason that you test (in your patch) does not fail is because both

render_to_string :template => "test/hello_world"

and

render :template => "test/hello_world"

renders the same template, try to change render_to_string to render some other template
version.title: render_to_string :template before normal render causes assert_template failures

version.body:
@Jal thank you.
Now I am able to reproduce it.
@@@ ruby def render_to_string_template_with_template_render #render_to_string :template => "test/hello_world" render_to_string :template => "shared" render :template => "test/hello_world" end @@@
I will look into it.
version.body-html:
@Jal thank you.

Now I am able to reproduce it.

  def render_to_string_template_with_template_render
    #render_to_string :template => "test/hello_world"
    render_to_string :template => "shared"
    render :template => "test/hello_world"
  end

I will look into it.
version.title: render_to_string :template before normal render causes assert_template failures

version.body: Attached is a patch with test cases. Big thanks to Jal for all the help.
version.body-html: Attached is a patch with test cases. Big thanks to Jal for all the help.

version.body:
@Neeraj: As I mention in comment 2. The problem also occurs if I use `render_to_string :file =>`
Could you make a test that covers that situation as well.
version.body-html:
@Neeraj: As I mention in comment 2. The problem also occurs if I use render_to_string :file =>

Could you make a test that covers that situation as well.
version.title: render_to_string :template before normal render causes assert_template failures

version.body-html:
Verified that this is not an issue with Rails 3.

@Jarl I lost my setup for this ticket. Will add to patch once I hear from José Valim to see if I am heading in the right direction.

Thanks.
version.title: render_to_string :template before normal render causes assert_template failures
